text: Abdulbasit Hindi (; born 2 February 1997) is a Saudi Arabian footballer who plays as a centre-back for Saudi Pro League side Al-Ahli. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=2|League !colspan=2|King Cup !colspan=2|Asia !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan=2 |Al-Ahli |2018–19 |11||0||1||0||5||0||7||0||24||0 |- !Total !11!!0!!1!!0!!5!!0!!7!!0!!24!!0 |- ! colspan=2 | Career totals !11!!0!!1!!0!!5!!0!!7!!0!!24!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Jizan Province Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Al-Amjad F.C. players Category:Al-Ahli Saudi FC players Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers
